name: Tattoo Studio Simulator 3D
description:
Tattooing is a lucrative business that allows its practitioners the kind of lifestyle freedoms most people can only dream of. Work when you want, earn big money and take as much time off as you like!

The big names fly around the world making guest appearances in tattoo parlors from Tokyo to Tallahassee with waiting lists as long as your arm.

But they all have to start somewhere, and if you've ever fancied yourself as a needle gun slinging ink wizard, Tattoo Studio Simulator 3D is one of the best places to begin.

Take your first steps into the world of tattooing with this challenging, fun, tattoo simulator where you'll need a steady hands and nerves of steel!

Unlike any other art form, there's no room for mistakes, one slip of the needle and you'll make an irreversible error that your customers will have to live with forever. In Tattoo Studio Simulator 3D there's no place to hide, one false move and you're out and down a stack of money.

We start you off easy enough - though don't go thinking it'll a breeze because it won't be - with a simple tribal tattoo piece that only needs one color.

Scrub up, slip on the latex gloves and grab your razor. Shave your customer's arm, apply the guide transfer and then pick out the correct needle gun. Make sure you've a steady hand because now is the time to steel your nerves and press that gun into their flesh, the ink is going in!

Follow the lines, be as accurate as you can and do not push that pain meter over the limit because when your customer reaches their pain threshold they will be out of the chair and through those doors faster than you can say pay me!

Get it right, though, and you'll be rewarded with riches and the sense of satisfaction that only comes when you've tattooed someone with a piece of outstanding art that they will treasure for the rest of their lives.

Take a tip from the pros - take your time. It' is not a race to the finish, the customer wants the best tattoo you can give them, and great art takes time to create, you can't rush through this!

Once you've mastered the basics, the world of tattooing will open up as Tattoo Studio Simulator 3D presents you with greater challenges and sensational tattoos to create, from simple single-color pieces to complete turtleback masterpieces.

Master each and every challenge in the game and you'll be well on your way to becoming a real tattooist in charge of their own destiny, in demand round the world, a celebrity of the body art scene like no other!
